description: Sheffield University First Class - strong degree performance

evidence: British citizen, exempt from English language requirements
First Class Honours in Computer Science from University of Sheffield
University of Sheffield ranked #104 in QS World University Rankings 2025
Excellent academic performance with final year average of 78%
Strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering
Excellent subject alignment with Computer Graphics programme
No academic publications found in submitted documents
Completed undergraduate dissertation on 'Machine Learning for Network Security' achieving 81%
Standard undergraduate level work, no conference presentations
No research experience beyond required coursework
18 months part-time work as Junior Web Developer at Sheffield-based startup
Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and basic backend development
Contributed to company website maintenance and small feature development
No leadership experience or major project ownership
Limited exposure to graphics programming or computer vision

strengths.point: Strong academic record and clear motivation
strengths.evidence: Personal statement demonstrates excellent academic foundation with First Class degree and specific interest in computer graphics research

strengths.point: Solid references from academic and industry supervisors
strengths.evidence: Academic reference confirms exceptional performance in final year, industry reference validates practical programming skills

weaknesses.point: Limited research or advanced project experience
weaknesses.evidence: Personal statement lacks mention of independent research projects or advanced graphics programming beyond coursework
